messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI Try-On project?
The ComfyUI Try-On project aims to provide a virtual try-on system using ComfyUI to help create a personal brand wardrobe collection.
Which nodes are used in the ComfyUI Try-On project?
The ComfyUI Try-On project uses the following nodes: CatVTONNode, FashionClothMask, and FashionClothMask2.
What is the CatVTON model and where can it be downloaded?

The CatVTON model is a virtual try-on model used in the ComfyUI Try-On project. It can be downloaded from the provided Baidu Netdisk link: [CatVTON Model](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1rajZvsgEBE9seNFjq935iQ?pwd=MAI0), with the extraction code: MAI0.
Where should the downloaded CatVTON model be placed?
The downloaded CatVTON model should be placed in the following directory: ComfyUI/models/catvton.
What are the two Segformer models used in the project and where can they be downloaded?

The two Segformer models used in the project are Segformer B3 Fashion and Segformer B2 Clothes. Segformer B3 Fashion can be downloaded from [Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/sayeed99/segformer-b3-fashion), and Segformer B2 Clothes can be downloaded from [Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/mattmdjaga/segformer_b2_clothes).
Where should the downloaded Segformer B3 Fashion model be placed?
The downloaded Segformer B3 Fashion model should be placed in the following directory: ComfyUI/models/segformer/segformer-b3-fashion.
Where should the downloaded Segformer B2 Clothes model be placed?
The downloaded Segformer B2 Clothes model should be placed in the following directory: ComfyUI/models/segformer/segformer_b2_clothes.
